programmes.show_description: Punchy reality show about a female judge that has made a real impact on the American justice system. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases. S8, Ep258
Punchy reality show about a female judge that has made a real impact on the American justice system. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases. S8, Ep259
Custody of a Spider motorcycle, the alleged theft of jewellery and life on a houseboat come into play when ex-lovers call it quits. S16, Ep257
A woman claims her ex-boyfriend from New York owes for an unpaid loan to move into a new apartment. S16, Ep258
A woman says her former friend borrowed money from her to keep from becoming homeless and has yet to pay her back. S16, Ep259
A woman insists that her former friend owes for her services as a singer in her gospel group; her friend countersues for the return of two dresses. S16, Ep260
A Siberian Husky pulls his teen owner on a skateboard then allegedly bites a young man at a skateboard park. S23, Ep1
A woman purchases an 11K car for her fianc√© then repossesses it two days later after finding him with another woman. S23, Ep2
The Judge takes a woman's allegations against her boss very seriously; she is shocked to discover the real story. S23, Ep3
Punchy reality show about a female judge that has made a real impact on the American justice system. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases. S8, Ep253

When a grandmother is found murdered in her hotel room, the killer wounds himself and inadvertently turns himself in. S6, Ep22
This is the story of two brothers who hit the big time on America's porn market, but their rocky relationship ended in disaster. S6, Ep23
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
A serial killer targets men in North London parks. Detectives race to catch him before he strikes again. Experts analyse his motives. S1, Ep13
Detectives discuss the brutal murder of Mohammed Yousaf by two greedy plotters. Experts reveal the forensic and psychological clues. S1, Ep14
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
Las Vegas investigative reporter Jeff German was a local legend, but in September 2022, it was the reporter making headlines. S36, Ep19
When a grandmother is found murdered in her hotel room, the killer wounds himself and inadvertently turns himself in. S6, Ep22
This is the story of two brothers who hit the big time on America's porn market, but their rocky relationship ended in disaster. S6, Ep23
The body of a female prison guard is discovered and a signature clue suggests that the killing could be linked to a previous murder. S6, Ep24
Investigators turn to satellite surveillance to track down the abductor of a young girl. When they find her, a hidden fingerprint helps solve the case. S6, Ep25
A young father is killed by a gang with various weapons. Detectives discuss how CCTV, phone and intelligence evidence were used to catch the killers. S1, Ep15
Steve Keogh discusses the murder of Jodie Chesney, a 17-year old girl stabbed in a park. The police, a CCTV expert, and court reporter share how the case was solved. S1, Ep16
This episode looks at the intriguing case of Kouri Richins, a children's book author who finds herself at the centre of a murder investigation following the death of her husband. S36, Ep20
When a state trooper is attacked, investigators uncover a 'signature' that links the assault to the murder of a young woman. S6, Ep26
When a woman vanishes under mysterious circumstances, investigators use cat hairs and insects to track her down. S6, Ep27
When the wife of a successful attorney is found shot in the head, DNA testing on blood spatters helps to solve the case. S6, Ep28
When a little girl was run over, her mother took the case into her own hands and used her knowledge of murder mysteries to find the vehicle responsible. S6, Ep29
Ex-lovers get into a heated battle over the thermostat, which ends in a fight over moving costs and an allegedly stolen dog. S23, Ep4
A food consultant sues her cookbook co-author for payment for work on her book; her co-author said the book never made a profit. S23, Ep5
When three unsupervised children annoy a roommate, an alleged assault takes place and a restraining order comes into play. S23, Ep6
A man hunts down the alleged family that stole his dirt bike from his backyard and damaged it; they claim it was a legit gift for their teen. S23, Ep7
A woman is sued for the unpaid balance on a car; she claims her friend bought two cars and she was hiding one from her family. S23, Ep8
A woman's microblading treatment allegedly goes astray and she sues for damages. S23, Ep9
A married couple sue the former owner of their new home for failing to disclose damage to the above-ground pool. S23, Ep10

While separated from his wife, a man is accused of racking up debt with his new girlfriend. A woman and her nanny wage war over childcare and money loaned for back surgery. S10, Ep35
A used car salesman claims a one-night stand turned into a fatal attraction and sues her for harassment. A teenager finds the steering wheel of her car locked by her mother. S10, Ep36
A school bus driver is sued for harassment when she tried to enrol her son into the same school as her grandson. A heated battle with her ex-daughter-in-law ensues. S10, Ep37
A disc jockey defends his work at a Bar Mitzvah and denies slandering his clients. S10, Ep38
After missing the flight to her Vegas wedding, a bride-to-be blames an intoxicated member of her own wedding party for getting them thrown off the plane. S10, Ep39
A parent calls animal control after her child has an alleged run-in with parrots and puppies and pets. A bartender claims a younger co-worker led him on romantically. S10, Ep40

Steve Keogh discusses a murder investigation with no body, a love triangle, and forensic clues. The case is solved with old-fashioned detective work. S1, Ep17
Detective Keogh and SIO Terry Crompton discuss the 2016 murder of Yang Liu, whose torso was found in a suitcase. S1, Ep18
In a case that captured worldwide attention, the Menendez brothers were tried and convicted of murdering their parents, Jose and Kitty Menendez. S36, Ep21
A mother and daughter vanish whilst out shopping. When the girl turns up dead, the mother is the initial suspect. But who really killed her? S6, Ep30
Lead singer of the band 'Bob Kuban and the In Men', Walter Scott, wrote 'The Cheater' a song that rang true in later life. S7, Ep1
Eight years after the murder of a woman in a Pizza Hut restaurant, a seemingly innocent man confesses to the crime. Was he the real killer? S7, Ep2
Top-notch forensic science helps solve real crimes. Investigators take to the water to determine who was responsible for a terrible attack on two boys out on a fishing trip. S7, Ep3
The Judge questions two women about their romantic choices when horrible allegations of abuse come to light. S23, Ep11
A food deliveryman with a handful of Burger King calls 911 after allegedly being bitten by a client's dog. S23, Ep12
After two young women purchase a mobile home for 4K, the previous owner accidentally burns it down before they can move in. S23, Ep13
A teenager pays a co-worker $50 for a car and then breaches agreement for future payments. S23, Ep14
A man admits that he put all the responsibility of finding a new tenant on his pregnant roommate's shoulders; he sues her for damages. S23, Ep15
Alleged slander, toxic trash and a major disagreement over property lines come into play when neighbours go after each other. S23, Ep16
A gambler wins a seven-day cruise, but makes the very wrong choice in travelling companions and claims she was left stranded in Miami. S23, Ep17
When peacocks attack and dogs get territorial, angry neighbours demand justice. A single mother denies hiding raw fish and other perishables in her ex-roommate's house. S10, Ep41
A child's playhouse is pushed over a fence and allegedly hits a parked car. Ex-lovers, who suspect each other of cheating, wage war over a hefty car loan. S10, Ep43
A man, found guilty of assaulting the mother of his child, sues her for alleged debts. An angry mother claims a neighbourhood child bullied her little boy. S10, Ep42
A machinist claims he was helping an unwed mother-to-be-by giving her a deal on a car. She accuses him of stealing her down payment. S10, Ep44
A man denies bragging that he keyed the car of his ex-girlfriend's new lover. Three children playing in a neighbour's basement are sued for property damage after adults hear a loud crash. S10, Ep45
